info.title: Alchemy Gas Optimized Transactions API JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard JSON-RPC methods for Gas Optimized Transactions API.

methods.name: alchemy_getGasOptimizedTransactionStatus
methods.summary: Returns the progression/status of transactions sent via alchemy_sendGasOptimizedTransaction.

result.name: Gas-optimized transaction status
result.description: Shows whether the bundle is in progress, complete, or abandoned.

jobStatus.description: The current status of the job.

transactionHashesAttempted.description: An array of currently submitted transaction hashes (32 bytes).

minedTransactionHash.description: The hash of the mined transaction if one has confirmed.

transactionHashWithErrors.description: An array of objects describing any errors that occurred with individual transactions.

hash.title: 32 byte hex value (any case)
hash.description: Hash of the transaction that had errors.

methods.name: alchemy_sendGasOptimizedTransaction
methods.summary: Submits a bundle of identical transactions, each individually with a range of different gas values.

params.name: rawTransactions
params.description: An array of signed transaction hex strings (1–20 items).

result.name: Gas-optimized transaction submission
result.description: Response includes a tracking ID and an array of transaction hashes.

trackingId.title: hex encoded bytes (any case)
trackingId.description: A transaction ID you can use to track status via alchemy_getGasOptimizedTransactionStatus.

transactionHashes.description: An array of currently submitted transaction hashes.
